title: As a BOC Admin, I want Clubs limited to entering waiver requests for the next bulletin
custom_steps:
Context: OAK entered an OR waiver request for Parker Merkel at 10:35 pm on 6/5. That request was for the 6/7 bulletin. The next morning, OAK entered another OR waiver request for Merkel at 11:18 am on 6/6. That request was for the 6/6 bulletin. The 6/6 bulletin was sent successfully yesterday, but the Merkel OR request for 6/7 remains on todayâ€™s bulletin. 

AC:

* Club users will not be able to request waivers for any day other than the next scheduled bulletin.
** Example: Between 2 pm ET Monday and 1:59 pm Tuesday, all waiver requests that are entered are for that Tuesdayâ€™ bulletin. Clubs should not be able to enter a waiver request during that time for any bulletin other than Tuesdayâ€™s.
** If they attempt to do so, they will get a blocking message:
*** Title: Error
*** Body: Waiver requests may only be entered for the next scheduled bulletin.  Please contact the BOC for assistance.
*** Buttons: Ignore & Continue (BOC Only), Back
* Club users will not be able to enter the same type of waiver request (OR or UR) more than once per player, per bulletin
* If they attempt to do so, they will get a blocking message

title: As a MNC Admin, I want a max weekly salary for all MNCs not tied to a MJ UPC
custom_steps:
AC:

* There will be a new Max Weekly MNC Salary constant
* Rule: No minor weekly salary can be greater than $8,400 unless there is an active ML UPC
* On Submit, Accept Terms, and Approve, there will be a rule check to confirm no weekly salary amount on the Add C is greater than the new constant
** Text: Error
** Body: No weekly salary amount may greater than [Max Weekly MNC Salary].  Please contact BOC for assistance.
** Buttons: Ignore and Continue (BOC Only), Back

title: As a MNC Admin, I want Rule Checks on Dual Sport Language
custom_steps:
* 3-year - permitted to use 3-years if bonus amount is up to and including $250k
* 4-year - permitted to use 4-years if bonus amount is greater than $250k and up to and including $1M
* 5-year - permitted to use 3-years if bonus amount is greater than $1M

title: As an MNC Admin, I want Previous Contract Type auto-populated by the system
custom_steps:
Related to: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1615|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1615|smart-link] 

AC:

* When loading a non-first year MNC is created, the system will automatically populate the â€˜Previous Contractâ€™ field
* Potential values are:
** Assigned from Major League Club
** Completed Previous Minor League Contract (free agent)
** Released Player
** Major League Free Agent
** Foreign Professional
** Successor Contract
* This field will not be editable for Club Users
* The field will be editable as a dropdown for BOC Admins

title: As a MNC Admin, I want Japanese Boilerplate Included in MNCs if the Player Speaks Japanese
custom_steps:
AC:

* If a player has their language set to Japanese on their profile, the Japanese version of the mUPC will be printed along with the English
* This will work similar to existing functionality for Spanish language

title: As a League Economics user I want the 'guaranteed option' checkbox on the major contract to factor into the calculations for AAV and total compensation
custom_steps:
If an option is checked as a â€˜guaranteed optionâ€™ its value should be included we calculating AAV and total compensation.

Trey Mancini is one of the players they want to use this on.

title: Self Service Query / Report for HR
custom_steps:
For benefits purposes, HR needs to track players leaving or joining the CLE org.  The report needs to be self-service as they will need to run it weekly for 2023.

One report with 4 sheets:

* All players traded TO CLE
* All players traded FROM CLE
* All players signed by CLE (only players with a previous MNC, no MJ players)
* All players released by CLE

Results for each sheet:

* EBISID
* Name
* DOB
* TX Date / Signing Date
* TO Org
* From Org
* For the signing sheet, what date were they released and by what Org

title: As a EBIS User, I want a new Outrighted MJ Roster Status
As a Drug Testing Admin, I want date filters on the Drug Test Request widget
As a BOC Admin, I want a warning returned if an Investigation request is submitted or approved for an un-registered player
As a BOC User, I want to send a player memo via Text
custom_steps:
AC:
 - When a player memo is sent, EBIS will send the memo to all players via Text using the MLB Official Contact Info
 - Deliveries and failures will be logged and available for download
